author: EXM7777
text:
you can create your own courses for ANY tool:

1. ask Gemini to deep research all educational YouTube videos about the tool
2. save all official documentation from the company's website
3. search relevant subreddits to find power user tips and real-world use cases
4. feed everything into NotebookLM and prompt it to create a detailed course from beginner to expert with practical exercises

now you have a personalized curriculum built from the best resources on the internet... tailored to how YOU learn

just practice with the exercises it creates and ask questions when you're stuck
